unnormalised:
Hanv, suttrachi suvat asa 123, Linking Rd, Bandra West, Mumbai, MH 400050, ti famad chayechi gaddi lagim, tumka kollta?
15/08 meren javab diyat!
normalised:
Vhoi, zaggo asa ek shemvis tin, Linking Road, Bandra West, Mumbai, M-H char lak pan'nas, tea prasiddh chai stall laguim, nhoi?
R-S-V-P pondra Agost meren!
text:
Hanv, suttrachi suvat asa 123, Linking Rd, Bandra West, Mumbai, MH 400050, ti famad chayechi gaddi lagim, tumka kollta?
15/08 meren javab diyat!
